def_cn: (广播和电视上或多个电视频道的)联播节目
def_en: A simulcast is a programme which is broadcast at the same time on radio and television, or on more than one channel.

def_cn: (在广播和电视上或多个电视频道)联播，同步播出
def_en: To simulcast a programme means to broadcast it at the same time on radio and television, or on more than one channel.
